model_answer: The text that appears on the screen at the same time as the mention of the 40 amp hour lithium iron phosphate battery is option B: Bioenno Power text during the close-up of the tent radio setup.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on video editing for help. When someone says '73, thank you,' it typically indicates the end of a transmission on a ham radio. Therefore, the correct answer should show something related to a radio or communication equipment. Option B seems like the most likely answer as it shows a person using a handheld radio.

Therefore, the answer is (B).
